_header: This Palamon in his bed lay

TCD432.First Lines:
This palamon in his bed layI herd emlyn syng so
                    dowcetly…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…I had or he of her a sighteþerfore I chalenge hir be
                    righte…
TCD432.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.11.

Essays on Chaucer.

             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
